fullDescription.intro:
Reads a google spreadsheet's sheet. The spreadsheet can be selected from available spreadsheets in google drive. Optionally a specific range can be read from the sheet, the range must be entered in A1 notation (E.g. "A1:G10").
For more information about the A1 notation visit:
developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#a1_notation
fullDescription.option: The spreadsheet can be selected from available spreadsheets in google drive.
Opens a dialog which lists the available spreadsheets from google drive.
Opens the selected spreadsheet in the browser.
The sheet from the spreadsheet that should be read. Available sheets can be selected from the drop down menu.
When selected, the first sheet of the spreadsheet will be read instead of the one selected from the drop down menu.
A specific range that should be read from the sheet can be given in A1 notation. (E.g. "A1:G20")
Whether the first row of the sheet should be read as column names.
Whether the first column of the sheet should be read as row ids.
